subject: Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Dear Beloved Friend,
I have something very important to tell you regarding your monthly
payment awarded. I hope i am not rude getting into your privacy? Your
name with email contact was found in the list of those who are to
benefit from these compensation exercise and that is why i contacted
you and i believe you will find this improvement useful, please your
respond will do you good and you can contact me with this email (
chistrowland12@gmail.com
)
for more information.
Thank's
Mr. Christian Rowland
chistrowland12@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Hello Mr. Christian Rowland,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm intrigued by your message and would like to know more about this monthly payment award you mentioned. Could you please provide more details? How was my name selected for this benefit?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rolando

subject: Re: Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Dear Beneficiary Mr. Rolando,

Thank for your response, mean while i am Mr. Christian Rowland from fund
recovery unit, and a meeting was held last week regarding a compensation
fund awarded to scam victims and non victims, the UNITED NATION (NU) and
the PRESIDENTIAL AUTHORITIES (PA) has passed new bill that no private
beneficiary payment will be approved which means only scam victims and non
victims and cooperate body payments are approved.

Mean while they have stated that the beneficiaries are mandated to travel
down to their office in UN office Africa to present his or her  files
before they will release or compensate the beneficiary, but the good news
is that I have already hired an attorney who represent you to the
conference meeting to enable the presidential office approve your file and
release your payment.

Note: the UNITED NATION and PRESIDENTIAL AUTHORITIES has decided to help
all the name listed to recover all the money they have lost in order to
receive your inheritance fund even if you are not a scam victim you will be
entitled to receive the payment since your name and email appeared to their
files and they have decided to register your name as one of the Social
Cultural Alliance (SCA) Member and your work is to stand as their financial
member. Your monthly payment will last only for 2years then your contract
with them will expired. Remember you will be receiving from their office
the sum of usd$34,690 every month for your compensation fund which will
last only for 2years with them, so that is the only way they have choosing
to pay all that have lost money in the hands of african scammers.

So please if this is OK by you then you have to respond back to me with
your FULL NAME/MOBILE PHONE/ HOUSE ADDRESS so that I will let you know the
next step, so upon your response then I will update you on what is needed
to proceed regarding this great opportunity.

I am waiting to hear from you as soon as possible.

For more inquiry, reply me with this email address(chistrowland12@gmail.com)
and i will get back to you.

Sincerely
From: Christian Rowland
chistrowland12@gmail.com
-------------------------

subject: Re: Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Dear Mr. Rolando,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's really interesting to hear about the new bill passed by the UNITED NATION NU and the PA. I'm glad to know that they are taking steps to help victims of scams and non-victims alike.

I'm also relieved to hear that an attorney has been hired to represent me at the conference meeting. That sounds like a great solution, as I wouldn't be able to travel down to Africa myself.

The idea of being registered as a Social Cultural Alliance SCA Member is intriguing. Could you tell me more about what this role entails? And how was my name and email selected for this?

The monthly payment plan sounds very generous, but I'm curious about why it only lasts for ten months? Is there any possibility for extension or renewal of the contract?

I appreciate your offer for further assistance, but before we proceed, could you provide more information on what exactly is needed from my end? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rolando

subject: Re: Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Dear Mr. Rolando,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite interesting to hear about the new bill passed by the UNITED NATION NU and the PA. I'm glad to know that they are taking steps to help those who have been victims of scams.

I'm also relieved to hear that an attorney has already been hired to represent me at the conference meeting. That's very thoughtful and considerate.

The idea of being registered as a Social Cultural Alliance SCA Member sounds intriguing. Could you please tell me more about what this role entails? And how was my name and email selected for this?

The monthly payment plan seems like a fair deal, but I would like to understand more about it. How exactly will these payments be made? And why does it only last for 10 months?

I appreciate your offer for further assistance and I might take you up on that in the future. For now, could you please provide more details on the points I mentioned above?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rolando

subject: Re: Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Dear Mr. Christian Rowland,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the new bill passed by the UNITED NATION NU and the PA. It's quite interesting to hear that they are taking such measures to compensate scam victims and non-victims alike.

I'm also intrigued by the opportunity to stand as a financial member of the Social Cultural Alliance SCA. The monthly payment plan sounds like a great initiative, but I would love to know more about it. Could you please provide more details on how this works? 

Also, I'm curious about the role of the attorney you mentioned. How will he represent me in the conference meeting? What exactly is his role in this process?

I look forward to hearing from you soon with more information.

Best wishes,
Rolando

subject: Re: Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Dear Beneficiary Mr. Rolando,

Thank you for that quick response and the question as you asked.

No 1: your name and email as you asked was dictated by our fund recovering
unit through google as a victim of scam activities.
No 2: Making you a financial member of the Social Cultural Alliance SCA
will automatically guarantee your fund safety upon the arrival to your
possession, maybe through transfer or through delivery based on your choice.
No 3: Your monthly compensation fund is $34,690 until 24 months which is
two good years and if you check the total amount, it will give you a total
of $832,560 USD, so read my second email and you will understand the
content very well. Your payment will last only two years and there is no
way they can change the amount because of you, because some individuals
have received their payment  the same amount as yours.
No 4:Due to the experience we had last year by one of the victim who
couldn't defend herself during the conference meeting last year when asked
what he will use this money for and while is she here, and she couldn't
defend herself, she was left behind and was sent back and until now her
files remain dormant. We now decided to hire an attorney to stand for you
since you can not travel out for personal and health issues as it was
tagged to your file documents. I hope I have cleared your question?

Now what is needed from you is to reconfirm your:

FULL NAME
MOBILE PHONE
HOUSE ADDRESS.

For proper documentation while you respond to the next options to get these
funds to your possession.

I am waiting to hear from you as soon as possible.

For more inquiry, reply to me with this email address(
chistrowland12@gmail.com) and i will get back to you.

Sincerely
From: Christian Rowland
chistrowland12@gmail.com
-------------------------

subject: Re: Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Dear Mr. Rolando,

Thank you for your quick response and the detailed explanation. I must say, it's quite a lot to take in! So, if I understand correctly, my name and email were identified by your fund recovery unit as a victim of a scam? That's quite surprising!

I'm also intrigued by the Social Cultural Alliance SCA. Could you tell me more about this organization? What does becoming a financial member entail?

The idea of receiving monthly funds for two years sounds very appealing. However, I'm curious about the process. How exactly will these funds be transferred or delivered to me?

You mentioned an unfortunate incident with a previous victim who couldn't defend herself during a conference meeting. That sounds like quite an ordeal! If I may ask, what kind of questions are typically asked at these meetings? And how would hiring an attorney help in this situation?

Lastly, you asked for my full name, mobile phone number and house address. While I understand that this information might be necessary for the process, I'm afraid I can't provide them at this time due to privacy concerns.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rolando

subject: Re: Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Dear Beneficiary Mr. Rolando,

Please this is the last time I will response to any more question from you
because everything I said here are clear. The SCA you mention was an
organization build or organized by United Nation for our retired fathers
and mothers as a way of helping them to take care of their self by
receiving a monthly of a thousand dollars per monthly. Who ever that join
this group are entitle to receive such amount every month.

The means of getting this funds to you depend on how far you have gone with
the procedure, the options are coming only when they have confirmed your
file. (2) I noticed that you have trust issues, by refusing to release your
information to me, so I believe you can handle this transaction by your
self so no need of allowing the attorney to stand for you, maybe you can
come over to sign your papers and go with your funds.

Thanks and God bless you.

Sincerely
From: Christian Rowland
chistrowland12@gmail.com
-------------------------

subject: Re: Dear Beloved Friend,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your response and the information provided. It's really interesting to hear about the SCA organized by the United Nations for retired individuals. I must say, it sounds like a wonderful initiative.

I'm curious though, how does one join this group? Is there a specific process or criteria that needs to be met? And once joined, how is the monthly amount determined?

Also, you mentioned something about signing papers. Could you please elaborate on what these papers are and what they entail? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rolando
